response.answer_text: Oh my oh my, I wish I hadn’t seen this, but I just had to comment. This is the reason I’m not a full on ARMY. If you’re a full on ARMY then I encourage you to NOT read this. So the song is called “Pied Piper” It encourages everyone to not study, and focus on just them. They’re telling you that you’ll be obsessed with them, they tell you to stop but you just can’t. They’ll take over you, even that just sounds plain wrong. You’ll never escape from them like a Pied Piper. Bts songs are not your ordinary songs. They are laden with hidden messages and dark thoughts. The backstory of the songs, the lyrics or what inspired them to write it is really mind boggling. Some songs that are impactful according to me are: Awake: This song by Jin, though melodious to hear, really wrecks my heart. Especially the line- 'Even so, i clutch six flowers in my hands'. The song talks about Jin's fears and struggles and the six flowers may refer to the others six members who are all younger to him. 2. First Love: Yoongi and the story of his Piano makes me cry than most love stories. And that's not all. It's based on his real life experience.  3. So far away: What can I say? This songs gives me shivers down my spine. Check it out for yourself.  Here is a link that's gives you more BTS songs which you have probably listened to numerous times but weren't aware of the meaning: 12 BTS songs with strong social messages
